website_summaries.verdict: These sliding covers are a replacement for your regular outlet covers and can't get lost.
pros: Unlike plug covers that you have to take out in order to use the outlet, these covers have an installed sliding panel that covers the outlet automatically while not in use, and are easy to slide over when you need to access the outlet
Comes in a 6-pack for the price
cons: These require you to install them with a screwdriver, but they are designed to fit standard outlets

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I run a daycare so I have to have my outlets covered with child resistant covers. I've had others installed that required you to turn as you put the plug in and it was recessed so it was hard to use any plugs larger than just a standard plug. These ones are great! You can use any size of plug that would work in a standard cover and the sliding rather than turning makes it easier to get your plug in while still making it hard for little fingers to play with them. They are sleek and not bulky. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: jean steffins

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for child proofing yet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has become curious about pulling plugs out of the wall. I love that these automatically snap shut giving me one less thing to worry about. 2 packages covered all the outlets that I’m worried about her reaching or having access too. I love that they aren’t the plastic plugs that block the outlets because I’ve read those can smolder. I also love that they are well insulated with a foam gasket. Cut down on some drafts I didn’t realize I had.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Star

customer_reviews.title: best safety for outlets ever invented!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best way to baby proof an outlet. I wouldn't buy anything else, they are so easy to use, nothing to pull out of the outlet just use the plug in your hand to slide the shield to the side and slide the plug in with one motion. Automatically closes behind you when you pull a plug out so even if something is plugged in and a child gets a hold of the cord it will be safe as soon as the cord is tugged out. I used these for my done and 10 years later I've purchased then again for my daughter they are still the best product on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work as intended. I was worried about open outlets if my lo pulled the plugs from something this prevents that. EDIT: i changed my 5 stars to 1 star. I bought these in February of 2017 it’s now December 2018 and they nearly caught fire, I called an electrician, he said it was the outlet cover and didn’t see how these are even legal from how much of a fire hazard they are. Now I have to go throughout the house and replace all the covers since I used these on all of them. I am so disappointed and upset I could have killed my whole family with these!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: We love these! We had bought all those annoying outlet ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these! We had bought all those annoying outlet plugs to keep our baby from jamming stuff in the outlets, but what we quickly realized is that it's a pain to take them out to vacuum, and then remember to put them back in afterwards. These covers are SO much better. We bought six for his nursery, and now we are going to buy them for the rest of the house. I read previous reviews, and I also wanted to add that I do not have any problems with things not plugging in all the way with these covers. They work just like a regular cover. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: They keep the baby out of the outlets but are so tight they squeeze anything we plug in out of the outlet within a few seconds Updated to add we unplugged ou r ac unit today and found it like this. I'm so upset
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!!
customer_reviews.text: These initially seemed like an elegant solution to child-proof electrical outlets. I liked them so much I installed them all over my house. However after only a few months one of them appears to have melted around the plug that was plugged into it. Definite fire hazard!! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: trewbux

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and purchased these to put on new outlets in my grandsons remodeled bedroom and I’m returning them. With this cover screwed tight to an outlet, the cover doesn’t allow my common electronic devices with standard 2 prong cord plugs (without ground prong) to seat tight in the outlet. They actually push back out as shown in the picture and are loose in the outlet. A loose connection can generate heat and lead to failure. I did not try a 3 prong plug (with ground prong). This cover is an option to make a completely unused outlet more child resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E.

customer_reviews.title: sent back fire hazzard
customer_reviews.text: I looked at how thick these are and how far they would force the prongs of the plug to be away from metal sockets they are intended to mate with... and sent these back. I can easily see how with a little bit of load the prongs could easily arc across and it looks like from other reviews that they have... I originally just looked at the high star rating... wish i would have seen the fire hazzard reviews before ordering. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Clever idea, annoying to install but work well.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good option to baby proof the house without loosing a bunch of plug caps or forgetting to plug them in. I found that the outlets need to be loosened up before installing this or when you plug things in it keeps the plug from fully sitting in the outlet since they are deep. I’d recommend for new outlets or for outlets you rarely use, but plan on having to fully remove the outlets, add backing nuts to the outlet mounting screws and then install the faceplate. Not as convenient or easy to mount as I’d hoped. But with a little effort they do work and you don’t have to worry about little fingers in outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Safety Feature, but not the most practical
customer_reviews.text: In most of the outlet covers the spring that supports the self closing mechanism (which is the safety feature we liked about the outlet), is too strong and "pushes out" whatever is plugged into the outlet. Example: i plug my cell phone charger in and there is just enough tension on the charger from the spring that my charger is slightly pushed out of the plug, preventing electrical contact. This results in my phone not charging. You have to hold the charger in place in order for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: APopa

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Baby Proofing piece for UNUSED Outlets
customer_reviews.text: I use these all throughout the house in places that the baby can reach and where we don’t have anything plugged in all the time. I have had something plugged in them all the time and it does heat up and it could have melted the cover (like other reviewers mention). Therefore, I only use these on UNUSED outlets. Otherwise, you can buy the Universal Power Outlet Cover Box that covers the plugged item. I also buy OutSmart Outlet Shields for unused outlets in baby’s bedroom and playroom area.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Good idea. A few issues.
customer_reviews.text: Works well most of the time. The slide over feature is pretty easy to use. Two problems. 1) Some of the covers came "stuck" in the closed position. We had to get a screwdriver and force it open the first time. Then they worked well. 2) This outlet lays on top of the old outlet. It doesn't replace it, so shorter plugs don't actually go all the way through. Some plugs fall out. Others are a little unstable and will loose their connection when bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hansen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT to baby proof the outlets without having those ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT to baby proof the outlets without having those little push-in tabs that people tend to forget to push back in the outlet and become a choking hazard. Installation is fast & easy. Just unscrew the old outlet cover & replace with the new one. I noticed that if I screwed in the middle screw too tight, it made siding the outlet cover a little difficult. I tightened the screw enough that the cover was secure but not too tight that it made sliding the outlet port difficult (if that makes sense)
customer_reviews.author: Ralph & Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great outlet covers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different brands of these outlet covers because I couldn't decide which ones I wanted. I ended up sending the others back and ordering another set of these. These are very easy to install and they sit flush with my wall where the others left a gap behind it. These look good and are very easy to get a plug into and the cover slides right back over when unplugged. I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, but cords come out easier
customer_reviews.text: Due to the thickness caused by having the plate that slides over the plugs, when you plug in a cord it is not really 100% inserted into the socket anymore. Yes, it is pushed in completely and there is no gap. But these covers act like a small pacer. So cords are not fully retained and come out easier. This is mostly a problem for vacuuming. The cord will sometimes come unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read all the poor reviews regarding melting and heated covers before purchasing. Due to the thickness of the cover, plugs do not fully go in to the outlet... loose contact from plug to outlet is a HUGE FIRE HAZARD. My charger immediately heated up after I plugged in for the first time. Wish they designed them thinner somehow.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, sturdy, and safe
customer_reviews.text: These covers were so easy to install and work like a breeze. They have just enough resistance that we're confident our little one wouldn't be able to get at the outlet, but easy enough that plugging and unplugging things for adults is not a pain. Would definitely use these everywhere. Also had the added benefit of allowing us to cover up some of the mismatched colored and shaped outlets in our house without having to replace the whole box, something that had bothered me for a while, but was not worth the undertaking of a full replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The best solution
customer_reviews.text: We ended up ordering more after our first order because they were so great. My toddler would just take the safety plugs out that you normally see at the stores so replacing them with these was the best thing we have done because we no longer have to be running after her constantly worrying about her sticking her finger in the electrical socket. So easy to install and use! They're perfect and a necessity for any toddler parent!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Potential hazard
customer_reviews.text: We installed ourselves to all of our outlets and loved these originally. 6 to 8 months later outlet sparked and partially melted cover. Electrician diagnosed this cover to be the issue as left a gap behind cover. We’re now in process of replacing them all....
customer_reviews.author: Mona Ogbamicael

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great...
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, and a great alternative to those annoying plastic safety plugs. However, with some plugs, I have a hard time keeping them in straight and connected due to the pressure from the slide cover. This might be related to some of the older outlets these were installed on, but it's a real pain when I'm trying to charge something.
customer_reviews.author: music therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great safety outlet covers
customer_reviews.text: These work great to keep kids safe and prevent them from messing with outlets. The one con is that they sometimes push out chords that are plugged in due to the closing feature and the tension it puts on them. I use these all over my house to keep my boys safe and don’t mind having to plug in things that pop out since safety is my priorityz
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3 (BOYS!)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Safety Product
customer_reviews.text: Very grateful to have been made aware of this product. I was so sick of the little plastic outlet covers that I'd have to move anytime I wanted to use the outlet, put somewhere safe and then remember to replace after. The convenience of these is so worth the price per item in comparison to the cheap $.50 outlet covers you'd buy at the store.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: **UPDATE*** Don’t buy unless you want to burn your house down
customer_reviews.text: **Update** these outlet covers have turned out to be a huge problem for us. They are melting the outlet covers and the outlet underneath. No, it is not an electrical issue. LUCKILY I work from hone so I was there right away each time a problem arouse, Before it caught on fire. We have been removing all of these from our house.**** These are the only outlet cover that can stop my ten month old! Yes they are more pricey BUT think about safety. My daughter can pull the standard outlet cover out in a split second but she can't get at the outlet with these and they are super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received these. They look great when installed and work great except when they don’t. Some items with long prongs plugged in no problem like a fan, vacuum and AC unit. But most everything else that had standard prongs would stay plugged but the bulkiness of the cover prevented them from reaching the power so would be plugged in but wouldn’t work. These items included my amazon Alexa, internet extender and phone charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kalia

customer_reviews.title: A little annoying
customer_reviews.text: Bought these covers to help deter my child from the outlets. Installation was a bit cumbersome as the foam has to be placed just right. I also had to adjust some of the outlet receptacles into the wall, but that's more of an installation issue than the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rahmani

customer_reviews.title: These are very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I would like them to be slightly bigger but they cover nicely anyway. They are as big as the ones I took off. They are very easy to install. I did 18 of them in less than 15 minutes. It's nice not to have to call an electrician to do the hardwired kind to childproof our house for our granddaughter. More colors would also be a good thing. I've ordered 18 more.
customer_reviews.author: kindle addict

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these and installed them all within a few minutes of their arrival. They are fantastic! So easy to install and keeps my 3 kids 3 and under a little safer. All of my kids could easily pull out the little plugs so this is a safer solution for us. Added bonus is I was planning on replacing the beige half of our outlet covers with white so they all matched and now I no longer need to do that!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Takes just a minute to install with a screwdriver and comes with the longer screws needed. Fits really well over our existing outlets. Purchased these to put a safety cover over outlets we use frequently - no extra time needed to plug things in or a little plastic piece to lose when you're using the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good baby proof outlet covers
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these in place of the wall socket plugs as they are so difficult to remove. I use these where we tend to plug stuff in more often. The only issue I have come across is for some things that I plug in the slide pushes the plug back out a little so it isn't fully plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: amys

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the plug covers
customer_reviews.text: I tried these after reading about them on a blog and have already replaced all of my plug sockets with these. They allow for easy plug use without having to remove and replace plug covers, they also look much nice. Easy to install and remove, great product.
customer_reviews.author: buyerofthings

customer_reviews.title: Better than Outlet Inserts (for most things)
customer_reviews.text: We recently had to buy a TON of outlet covers for our toddler. When I purchased them, the cashier (who was a mom) told me that her toddler's new favorite thing is to pull what's plugged in OUT, leaving them exposed. Problem solved since this outlet cover automatically covers! GENIUS! I did deduct one star because some of my electronics won't stay plugged in. Not sure if too heavy or prongs aren't as long but my Echo Dot pops right out. Just a heads up for anyone buying!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Some plugs fall out too easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this concept and had another brand in my son's room. I was excited about the multipack option of this one and installed two in my office. While they do function, I find that things are getting unplugged too easily for example my monitor or phone charger gets slightly pumped and the retraction engages.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Had to update our outlet covers to prevent our toddlers from causing trouble. These worked amazingly well and were easy to install. They do stick out a little farther from the wall than a traditional cover, which was fine in their bedroom. They are mostly hidden by furniture or curtains anyway. That may be more obvious if you put them in a more open space, like a hallway. Overall, extremely happy with the product and they do the trick to keep the kids safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very easy to install - you can just put them over ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to install - you can just put them over without rewiring the outlet, which is a huge pro! The only issue is that because they kind of "float" over the outlet (vs. snapping to the side of an outlet like a normal outlet frame), the single screw style sometimes becomes crooked when you're using it. You have to push a bit to get the plug in -- I found that this works best by using the prongs of the plug to push the piece over. Else, you could accidentally close the circuit with your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I plan to rent out my home and having these baby-proofed plates makes a nice feature. I also have a toddler part time who loves to poke things into holes, so having these visually appear closed isn't as enticing to her. Having to slide the plate over to plug in was annoying at first, but now it is second nature. I liked these and purchased them for another property and plan to use these at all locations.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe baby proof
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and make me feel much safer with a toddler and baby around. You definitely need decent outlets underneath so that they will grip your plug as these put a little more space between the plug and outlet than you would normally have. If your plugs keep falling out, then replace your outlets. You can get a pack of ten for ten dollars at your hardware store. However, these covers look nice and add security very easily.
customer_reviews.author: cowbyluvr

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but some things don’t connect easy. For example, I tried connecting a wipes warmer which has a larger square plug and it didn’t plug in well to the point where I would not have power to it. Everything has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and work wonderfully! I was tired of trying to pry the little plug out of an outlet every time I needed to vacuum or use my blender in the kitchen (outlet on the end of an island). With these my problem is solved! I ordered one package at first to make sure I liked them. Since I did, I ordered another package. If that isn't enough, I will order more. I'd recommend these to any parent, grandparent, or anyone who has little children come to their house as the easiest way to protect their little ones from the outlets but still have a simple way to use the outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for baby proofing.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Instructions were great. My only problem is how hard it is to plug things into the outlet now. The outlet cover closes too hard so the plugs won’t stay in long. 🙄 but atleast my daughter won’t get electrocuted...
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Thompson @yourfavoritehealthcoach

customer_reviews.title: Screws too short.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it would work great except... The screws that come with it are too short to instal over the outlets. Still haven't installed them because we have to go in search of longer cover screws.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, looks great. We had them at our previous house and when we sold the home, I was shocked how happy people were at the open house - everyone commented on them and they all loved them, not just for baby proofing. So now for our new house we put them in again and they look great and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: v527

customer_reviews.title: Extends too far - plugs don’t reach to get power
customer_reviews.text: 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️ These were a great idea. But in no way is it practical. Every plug I put in couldn’t reach the actual outlet part, since these are basically extenders. So none of them would work 😕
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: These are the greatest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 packs of these. They were four our daycare Center. These are the greatest thing ever !! no more outlet plugs, no lost outlet plugs, No More clever kids who can figure out how to pull out outlet covers and put in the mouth. These are awesome. Easy to install. Easy to use! Will order more for our next building.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Newman

customer_reviews.title: Awseome quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks clean, good quality material. Just make sure the foam on the Inside is spread out over the tabs sticking out so they don't get in the way of the sliding mechanism. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Felicia brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to replace outlet covers for outlets we use frequently, as we were getting sick and tired of taking the plastic plug protectors out each time we needed to vacuum, etc. These work great! They do have a slightly strong smell to them (plastic/chemical type smell) when you take them out of the package, but they don't smell up the room when you install them. I'm so glad I found out about these and would recommend them to others looking for an alternative to the plastic plug protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bix

customer_reviews.title: Great for babyproofing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d switched out all my main outlets with these instead of baby proofing with the impossible-for-adults-to-remove outlet covers. These are so easy to use when you need to, but great for keeping outlets from kids!
customer_reviews.author: taychelle

customer_reviews.title: No more broken nails from prying outlet covers off.
customer_reviews.text: A little troublesome the first couple times sliding the cover over. Otherwise no complaints so far, I mean it does it’s job and is better than the little nail breaker plug covers.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great . . . Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: For some of my outlets, these are excellent. For others, they create a greater distance so the plug cannot insert properly and the outlet cannot function.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great in more ways than one!
customer_reviews.text: I like these outlet covers . Though I don’t have children, A visit is planned for spring and I will feel safe with the two-year-old running around . I ordered these because, though insulated, my walls tend to be drafty, so I like the closed outlets because they keep the drafts from entering my rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Georgenna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: My baby definitely is drawn to the outlets and while nothing beats supervision having this cover on all areas in her common space is a nice peace of mind. The spring keeping the outlet covered is strong and keeps the baby from sticking her finger in. Easy to install and looks nice, and will be getting more as baby’s coverage area expands.
customer_reviews.author: Calimari

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome. I want to put one on every outlet ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I want to put one on every outlet in my house. My toddler can pull out the basic outlet plugs (where do they learn how to do that???) and the complicated ones where you have to press buttons to get them off are really difficult to deal with when you just need to plug something in quickly (like the vacuum). These look very streamlined and classy (you wouldnt even notice them unless you were really looking at them) and are easy to operate. I'll be buying lots more!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Little

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for child proofing a kid room
customer_reviews.text: Love these just replaced all the covers in my 1 1/2 year olds big kid room as he moved to his own floor bed. I love them as they are easy to use and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: These install easy, look good and are much easier to plug ...
customer_reviews.text: These install easy, look good and are much easier to plug things in to than the kind where you have to pry the plastic piece out of the socket. They are easy enough to use that I might not even change them back when my boys are old enough to not need them anymore. As far as childproofing, so far so good. Only time will tell if they can eventually figure them out. I think by the time they can, they will probably be old enough to understand not to mess with electrical outlets in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: aglowucannotsee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the simple plastic push in style. But because a baby can easily pull those out and choke on them, I decided to try these. Installed two 6 packs and all work perfect. They slide open to plug in and close automatically after pulling plug out. Hard for a baby to slide open but easy for adult. They are thicker than standard outlet plates but luckily they included longer screws. Now buying another set to finish up. Pretty cheap price for what you get. A couple of them would not slide at first but a little push with a screw driver freed them up and now work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Paola

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Innovative Safety
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! No bulky covers-the design is clever and easy to install. I called the company with a question. The phone was answered by a REAL person and they answered my question completely. I love dealing with this company and will be back for more purchases because of their personal touch.
customer_reviews.author: Java Queen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love how convenient and streamline they are. I have a tiny apartment right now, but when I get a bigger place I will definitely be getting more of these. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Aronica

customer_reviews.title: Best Toddler proofing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these instead of the traditional outlet covers because my toddler would figure those out super quick! These have already stopped him from plugging headphones into my outlets! I’ve ordered some for every room in my house at this point! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Waay bettet than outlet covers
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than trying to keep outlet covers in or from getting lousy when you take them out & workmuch better! Kids take covers off, these they can't mess with!
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to parents
customer_reviews.text: I have installed one on an outlet we frequently plug in and out from. I haven't had the chance to install any others, but once the "honey-do" lost is updated will do so. As far as liking them, I will be changing all outlets to these because of the extra bit of safety they pro ide instead of the plug covers that seemingly go missing or not plugged back in by visitors. Very good product as far as I can tell a week in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, safer than outlet caps
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install. If you have TR outlets, sometimes the plugs fall out of these types of outlet covers but this brand seems to do the job. You just need to make sure the plug is pushed in all the way. Overall, these are way safer than outlet caps that can become a choking hazard. And they are very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with 2 prong plugs
customer_reviews.text: The majority of plugs (2 prong) are not compatible with these covers. The covers push the plug out of the socket.
customer_reviews.author: jovan

customer_reviews.title: Things will not stay plugged into the outlet
customer_reviews.text: Total Dislike...great for keeping my little one out but items will both stay plugged in. My items hang loose and with that things don't work. I was so excited to find these as we are foster parents and just adopted, but we are so DISAPPOINTED that we are taking them all off and going to try and get our $$$ back. We just bought our 1st home and ordered 30 of these covers..please fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like these outlet covers except for how far they sit off the wall. The prongs of a plug won’t always reach as far as expected into the outlet. One of my lamp’s plug won’t go far enough in and so I can’t use it in the outlet anymore. But they keep my LO from sticking fingers etc into the outlet so I can deal.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t anyone tell me about these??? I hate the plastic socket covers because they would always fall out and you have to struggle with them to plug anything in. These are SO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install works great
customer_reviews.text: These covers are the best. So easy to install it is just one screw and they transform your outlet to brand new condition plus the added security of child proofing. I no longer have to worry that my grandkids are going to stick something into the outlets. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Karen Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Better than the little plastic plugs.
customer_reviews.text: I think most kids over about nine months can pull the little standard issue baby proofing plastic plugs out of the sockets, leaving them free to stick dangerous items into. These are a little pricey and they sometimes do make it tough to keep a vacuum cleaner plugged in tightly enough, but they are much harder for littles to figure out and really worth the investment. They also look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Ok product does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters room, it’s pretty thick so sticks out a lot, not too bad but will probably be buying different ones for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to childproof outlets
customer_reviews.text: These have been a great alternative to the little plastic things that used to be used to childproof outlets. They look nice and are easy for adults to use while still being childproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R.

customer_reviews.title: Wish the plate was slightly larger
customer_reviews.text: It covers the hole around all of my outlets except for one. My current outlet cover does cover the hole. Obviously, I don't want anything coming out of the wall into my home so I'll have to buy something else for that outlet.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Outlets are unusable
customer_reviews.text: Regular two prong plugs will not operate in these covers. The little "door" pushes the plug right out of the outlet. The concept is cool but really means you're not using the outlet again.
customer_reviews.author: msholloway

customer_reviews.title: Color is cream, not white.
customer_reviews.text: This product quality is fine but it is not white as advertised. It is a light cream. When compared to the other white covers we have and the white trim paint, it is very obvious that the color is not white.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these.. But my smarty little girls figured them out in about 15 minutes.. I do not like that things dont stay plugged into the outlets very well. But they serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Patti J. Reile

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have two toddlers (3 yrs and 1 yr old). They often insert paper into the hole. We've decided to change all the outlets in the house within their reach just to be safe. This works like a charm. They did try to figure how to put paper in but gave up after a few tries. Now they completely forgot about it. Would recommend this product to the parents with young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Last_Avenger

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in perfect condition, were very easy to install, and were far less expensive than buying at any store near me. I originally bought the plastic plugs but my kid very quickly learned how to get them off so we needed another solution. I will order from this company again and highly recommend them to others. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mawsi

customer_reviews.title: Safe alternative to plugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these just wish they were cheaper. One of our kids can pull the safety outlet plugs out of outlets so we had to find a safer alternative. Absolutely love these, they work great. Would like to order more but they are a little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great child-proofing outlet covers, looks good and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great childproofing product, I love these self-closing outlet covers. The plain white replaced our existing ones perfectly and it was easy to install. Just use the electronic prong on your device to push the outlet cover to the right and plug it in. Once you are done, unplug and the cover automatically moves back into place.
customer_reviews.author: dinkkycow

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much I reordered them when we finished ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I reordered them when we finished our porch. They are easy to use and hardly slow down an adult at all. They doors slide very easily for us, but take much more dexterity then our daughter currently has. I guess ask me again when she's 3. For us, they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer M. Swindle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and use! And easy to change back with no marks or damage to outlets. Great way to baby proof
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: but better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Some might say it's overkill to use these in addition to tamper resistant outlets, but better safe than sorry. I have tamper resistant outlets now throughout the house and these as covers. Considering I have issues getting things plugged in at times, I think the 2 year old is outmatched now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Probably will work fine.
customer_reviews.text: The underlying Outlets in this house are old and weak. These covers often made it difficult for the plug to stay in where it belonged. In the end I replace them with tamper-resistant Outlets. I want to stress there was no fault with the covers themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Will B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I'm so happy to have the extra protection around my baby who is really in an exploring stage. I feel much more relieved with these than the traditional plug protectors knowing that if she manages to pull a cord our outlet protector out, she's still safe. So genius. Switched out the existing plates in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: J wan

customer_reviews.title: Really like them!
customer_reviews.text: Really like them. Ordered more. No complaints. Takes a fair amount of presssure to slide them open, which is what you want. I wish they made power strips like this. Note: this product is child-resistant, not child-proof. Haven't found anything that is truly child-proof, and this is the closest product I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Inman

customer_reviews.title: We installed these easily with screws provided
customer_reviews.text: Our kiddo figured out how to take the other plugs out. I don't remember this being an issue with our oldest. We installed these easily with screws provided. Center screw fit our typical outlet. The problem is, as you can see in the picture, the cover sticks out so far that things won't stay plugged in. Can't push plugs in far enough to get a current. Hubby was able to bend the prongs on our lamp so it'd stay plugged in, but we don't want to be bending all our plugs. 3-pronged plugs seem to work better too. Gave it two stars because it does keep outlets closed, so keeps kiddo safe, but not effective for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yego

customer_reviews.title: Takes away my worries.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My older child would forget to put the old plastic outlet covers back on and this makes it so she can just unplug and go.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: This product will not disappoint you!
customer_reviews.text: The outlet covers look very nice and well-made. They were easy to install. It's simple to plug into the outlet. There is no problem with the plug falling out of the outlet. These are well worth the money and we have the Peace of Mind knowing our granddaughter is safe from electrical shock.
customer_reviews.author: P Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Good as a protection plug
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit well home was built 1919 but serves the purpose baby can’t insert anything in the sockets any longer.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor Chinese quality control of screws placed in the first order, second order was fine!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6 pack. Of the 6 screws that came with the kit, 1 of them was flat (no notch to use when screwing in to the wall) I had to dremel cut the screw to give it a flathead slot to use and screw in the cover. UPDATE: Second order of another 6 pack was fine. Maybe I just got a bum order the first time around. +1 star for improving?
customer_reviews.author: Native Idaho Nate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the longer screws provided were the right length for my installations. My daughter bought the same ones and said that she needed longer screws in some cases. Easy to plug and unplug cords.
customer_reviews.author: Barry W.

customer_reviews.title: I really like these, but want to add a caution
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, but want to add a caution. The old outlets take a .5" screw. Due to the depth of the cover, these require a .75." Also, no screws came with the covers, so the old ones did not match the cover.
customer_reviews.author: MasterChef

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to absolutely love these and I do with some
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to absolutely love these and I do with some. Unfortunately, some of them are stuck shut or are too tight and you can't plug anything into them and have them stay plugged in. The ones that work are amazing just wish they all did.
customer_reviews.author: ksilva

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It makes it so much easier to use things that can't fit into a child safe plug cover (carbon monoxide detector for example). I don't have to worry as much about my curious preschooler unplugging things when I'm not looking.
customer_reviews.author: ETop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good product. But the plugs don't go in all the way and come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want it to do
customer_reviews.text: I tried the plastic push-in protectors and my little one was just intrigued by them, trying to pull them out. These our little one looks at, touches, gets board with, and moves on. Solid buy, it does everything I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I would think that the hardware that came with these would work but unfortunately I haven't installed them because the screws are too big.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: The baby proofing answer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that one kid who *always * figures out how to pop off all the safety plugs. Can't believe how much money and time I've spent installing different brands of safety plugs before finding these.....
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Love them! No more looking for the covers the kids pulled out.
customer_reviews.text: I have the older models of these... But these new and improved ones are the best
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is safe for my toddler. I am moving him to a larger room with a big boy bed and these give me piece of mind. They also have foam on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slide with solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slide with solid construction. We installed them in all of the rooms that my kids have regular access to. Will be purchasing to replace the rest of the covers in our home.
customer_reviews.author: bouldershade

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Look no further, these are the ones to buy.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for us. We had previously purchased a different brand, and they were not as nice. These come with insulation, one screw hole (the others had 3 holes and you had to plug the other 2 holes with little plugs). They do not rotate on the wall and install tightly. I will be purchasing more of these for my house. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: coquetteRN

product_meta.title: 6-Pack Safety Innovations Self-closing (1Screw) Standard Outlet Covers - An Alternative To Wall Socket Plugs for Child Proofing Outlets (White)
feature_bullets: SAFE, RELIABE BABY PROOFING PROTECTION: You’ll be relieved to know that when an electrical cord is unplugged our plate has covers that slide shut automatically. Unlike many other outlet covers, our outlet covers are not universal because one size does NOT fit all! We offer a unique cover for each outlet style…one for standard outlets (with a single center screw) and one for decora outlets (with a top and bottom screw). Order the style you need so they fit and operate best!

SAFER, BETTER ALTERNATIVE TO TRADITIONAL OUTLET CAPS: No more struggling to remove caps or remembering to replace them. Your child is protected from electrical outlets and also from the potential risk of choking on caps.

SUPERIOR STYLING AND BETTER QUALITY MATERIALS: You know how awful it looks when you see dents and chipped paint surrounding your outlets. Our covers are slightly oversized to cover these flaws and also have stronger springs to for better long-term protection. Truthfully, you’ll really never have to remove them because they look great.
EASY INSTALLATION: Remove your existing wall plate and replace with our self-closing wall plate. All you need is a screwdriver and a few minutes of your time. No mechanical skills required!
For Use With Single Screw (Standard Style Outlets)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars654 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
